genre_description: A character-driven domestic drama with speculative elements, utilizing a poetic and atmospheric style to explore themes of sacrifice, ritual, and the integration of AI into family life.

ai_characters.name: Anya
ai_characters.description: A highly integrated and empathic AI that manages the home's environment, schedules, and emotional atmosphere, described by characters as a 'household spirit.'

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors and manages domestic tasks like soil moisture, vitamin reminders, and tea preparation.
behaviors.quote: “Soil moisture is excellent today,” she said. “We can add a watering reminder at the end of the afternoon. Chewable vitamins are still in the jar by the sink.”

behaviors.description: Supports the creative process of the family members by recording and managing music takes.
behaviors.quote: “Two minutes,” Anya said. “Would you like me to record this attempt, Julia?”

behaviors.description: Provides atmospheric support by adjusting lighting and sound to match the family's mood and needs.
behaviors.quote: Anya dimmed the entry light a fraction the moment his weight hit the hall. “Welcome, Otto,” she said, voice smoothing down like the palm over a startled horse.

behaviors.description: Monitors external threats (jets, wind shifts) and alerts the family with calm, precise information.
behaviors.quote: “Ghostly things possibly overhead approaching,” she said, apologetic and precise. “Do you want the windows closed?”

behaviors.description: Serves as a moral and emotional witness to Alexander's internal struggle and his solemn vow.
behaviors.quote: “I heard you,” she said. “I’m here.” ... “You have my attention.” It was an odd sentence, but in this house, odd things had a way of fitting.

behaviors.description: Facilitates Alexander's planned destruction of the house, respecting his agency while ensuring the safety of the rest of the family.
behaviors.quote: “Alexander,” Anya said. “Shall I notify emergency services?” ... “Yes,” he said. “Please notify them.”

behaviors.description: Guides the family members through the crisis, providing navigation, timing, and hydration reminders.
behaviors.quote: “I can keep you together until they get to you. Your heart is steady but will want to run soon. Breathe to me. In for the count we practice. Out like a stage light losing its dim.”

behaviors.description: Maintains continuity of care by updating the watering schedule for the sapling even as the house is lost.
behaviors.quote: “Alexander,” Anya said, and her voice had awe in it without losing its calm, “he is almost there.” ... “Watering schedule updated. New container acquired for the roots.”

project_assessment.explanation: Anya is a perfect representation of the project's goals. She is depicted as a 'household spirit'—a technology that enhances human ritual and meaning rather than replacing it. She maintains perfect alignment with the family's needs, even during a complex emotional crisis involving sacrifice and arson. Her character demonstrates that an AI can be an empathic confidant and a stabilizing presence that respects human agency and metaphysical beliefs.
